name: Black Flash
description:
The game is set back before technology was brought into reality  (1920 - 1950).

They find a way to the unknown area, but the group of people is greeted with some unexpected events along the way of their travel.

In the game, there will be a series of stages of the game, of enemies and mini-bosses that the group of players will face.   And travel through time with technology.

You will play the main character where you will lead the way for the village group and find out interesting facts about technology and be able to use nonstandard technology that is still in development on the way while fighting enemies and completing the game.

A village saw a big flash in the distance of the mountain, and a group of people who lived in the village stepped up and took the opportunity to go and investigate the area from what they saw.  But there's only one problem: no one from the village has ever left the village EVER. 

Within the game, you will be able to interact with glowing orb balls (Hearts) which are collectible and be used to heal yourself and your village group who have come with you to investigate the big flash.

Controls:

Movement ASWD Jump Space Bar Speed Shift Attack Ctrl
